presentation.text: My name is Damien and I am {age:04.03.2004} years old !
I am a third year development apprentice at the ETML in Switzerland
I am a developer with particular expertise in Back-end development

texts.text: I am a skilled developer with experience in multiple programming languages.

I engage in daily programming activities to learn new languages, libraries, frameworks, etc., as well as to work on personal projects. I enjoy acquiring new knowledge and expanding my skillset to optimize the quality of my projects and work. I never give up at the first sign of a problem!
I have a quick learning curve and easily familiarize myself with the tools used in development.
Since 2018, I have developed a strong interest in programming and related fields. Programming has become my predominant passion.
My main goal is to excel in development and independently acquire new skills in other domains to design more complex projects.
